text: The Palomar College station is a Sprinter light rail line and a BREEZE bus station. It is served by North County Transit District. It is the main transport station in San Marcos, California. The bus pickup area is in Palomar College. The train station is across the street. == Platforms and tracks == Westbound station Station Station Station Eastbound station Buena Creek (toward Oceanside Transit Center) Palomar College San Marcos Civic Center (toward Escondido Transit Center) ← → == Other websites == *Map of the station on Google Maps Category:North County Transit District stations Category:2008 establishments in California
title: Palomar College (NCTD station)
